entry.title: noureddineouafy/silana-lite-ofc: Silana Lite Official is a smart WhatsApp *** powered by AI, offering a wide range of features like automated responses, multimedia downloads, language translation, text-to-speech, and more. Lightweight and efficient, it enhances personal and group chats with customizable plugins and seamless automation for a smarter messaging experience.
entry.content: Silana Lite Official is a smart WhatsApp *** powered by AI, offering a wide range of features like automated responses, multimedia downloads, language translation, text-to-speech, and more. Lightweight and efficient, it enhances personal and group chats with customizable plugins and seamless automation for a smarter messaging experience.

entry.title: SK3CHI3/universal-resource-hub: Universal Resource Finder A global platform designed to help users discover free, high-quality resources across various categories like technology, design, education, and business. This lightweight and community-driven website makes it easy to find tools, templates, courses, and more from trusted sources. Key Features: Powerful Search: Instantly

entry.title: indrajithc/LiteMart: LiteMart is a high-performance e-commerce application framework crafted for blazing-fast web experiences. It is built with a focus on minimalism, pure JavaScript for component-based architecture, and a lightweight design to deliver exceptional mobile performance.
entry.content: LiteMart is a high-performance e-commerce application framework crafted for blazing-fast web experiences. It is built with a focus on minimalism, pure JavaScript for component-based architecture, and a lightweight design to deliver exceptional mobile performance.

entry.title: fix2015/no-sleep-app: NoSleepJs is a lightweight JavaScript library that prevents devices from going to sleep during critical activities. It uses the Screen Wake Lock API or a fallback video playback method to keep the screen active, ensuring uninterrupted user experiences across modern and legacy devices.
entry.content: NoSleepJs is a lightweight JavaScript library that prevents devices from going to sleep during critical activities. It uses the Screen Wake Lock API or a fallback video playback method to keep the screen active, ensuring uninterrupted user experiences across modern and legacy devices.
